sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-container>
<b-row align-v="center" class="my-row">
<b-col class="my-col">
  <kapper-card v-for="kappers in list" :key="kappers.id" :name="kappers.kapper.name" :age="kappers.kapper.age"></kapper-card>
</b-col>
</b-row>
  </b-container>
</template>

<style lang="scss">
.my-row{
border: px2 solid rgb(179, 241, 8);
}
.my-col{
border: px2 solid rgb(0, 255, 64);
}
.my-container{
border: px2 solid red;
}
</style>
<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import kapperCard from "@/components/kapperCard.vue"
import axios from 'axios';


export default {
  name: "Home",
  components: { "kapper-card": kapperCard
  },
  data(){
    return{
      list: []
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    axios
    
      .get('http://localhost:9999/kapper')
      .then(response => {
        console.log(response.data._embedded.kapperResourceList);
        this.list = response.data._embedded.kapperResourceList;
        console.log(this.list)
      })

      }

  };
</script>
